layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x228
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x228
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x204
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 322x18
          text run at (0,0) width 322: "There should be no red borders on the table below"
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,34) size 161x170 [border: (2px none #808080)]

          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,0) size 156x55
